markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodletting Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1344) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
fangs unarmed attack

</column>

---

You emulate your vampiric parent's techniques for drawing blood from a victim. Your fangs Strikes deal an additional 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a critical hit.
name: Bloodletting Fangs
